title: LF fellow bronze tier players :)
body:
HIya, looking for teammates for both dynamic and ranked. I've been playing for a couple of years, but I'm an ARAM main, so my summoner's rift game isn't as strong as I like. I'm support when I do venture onto the rift, but I'm open to learning other roles if the need arises.

I'd be super glad for company to help build up my normal wins & to hit them ranked games :)

Feel free to respond or just add me!

replies.body: :D hallo. i've added you on my league. poke me when you're on next!!! :)
okay i haven't played for almost 2 years now so it will take me time to get back to how i was at the game
What's with the downvotes for all things Bronze related? This post is legitimately asking for assistance and it gets down voted.
it's cos we're surrounded by ocean. it makes everything... salty :)
Hey, add me too, i have dropped to b5, but im going up. I main almost all the adc.
Added :)))) Please send me a message when you see me on!
